page.title: 13Priory C.E. Jun.Sch.Trentham
page.content: All round the school there are trees and fields.There are ten classrooms in the school,a music room a craftroom and a hall.Each classroom has three rows of desks and a blackboard.The timetable involves lots of subjects,English and Maths in the morning and subjects like History and Geography in the afternoon.School starts at 9.10am and finishes at 3.30pm.At 9.10am everybody goes into school where a register is called,then we have assembly.After assembly we have Maths and English.In between them we have a fifteen minute break.After English we have dinner.Dinner lasts an hour and then we have lessons like Science and Computers.The school has a choir and an orchestra which put on plays twice a year.The school also takes part in swimming,athletics and other sports.
